runs.comm: good length from over the wicket, Guptill gets on the front foot and defends
a full ball down leg side, first extra of the innings

Guptill slogs and mis-hits one now, he was aiming for down the ground but sliced it just beyond the circle at extra cover, the fielder at cover and mid-off converged on the ball but it fell between them. Mid-off eventually dived for the catch but really the fielder at cover should have run faster and got there
nudged off the pads in front of square leg for a single
short of a length and straight, Guptill dabs the ball towards the off side and runs quickly
short of a length, Williamson pulls behind square
shot! steps out of his crease towards leg and punches a short of a length ball through cover point
too full and on the pads, Guptill stays in his crease and flicks to deep square leg, the fielder runs to his left from long leg and dives but can't save the boundary
short of a length ball jags back at Guptill, who does well to adjust on the back foot and dab the ball towards third man
shot! The delivery was full and straight, and Williamson drove it along the ground with a perfectly straight bat, hitting the ball between Guptill and the stumps at the other end
strays on to the pads this time and Williamson glances it to the fine leg boundary, just a deft touch this time
flicked off the back foot, sending the ball through midwicket for two more
short of a length and straight, Williamson plays a whippy swat to midwicket
stays in his crease and opens the face to steer the length ball angling across him towards point
steps out of his crease and pulls a length ball to the deep midwicket boundary, Guptill was a little early on the shot and he rolled his wrists to drag it from outside off
down the ground this time, Guptill clears his front foot and drives the ball hard to long off
watch out in the stands! Guptill clears his front foot again, goes into his crease, and mows the ball over the deep midwicket boundary with so much power despite hitting the toe of the bat
slogged towards wide mid-on for a single
played off the back foot into the covers
Guptill backs away and hacks at the ball, wanting to smash it through cover, he gets a thick edge past slip to the third man boundary
a full ball outside off and this time Guptill does hit it over cover, on the front foot and driving hard
cut off the back foot through point
the fifty comes up for NZ, Guptill gets on the front foot and carts a full ball back over the bowler's head, a torrid first over for Vandersay
and it gets worse for him, he bowled that flatter and faster, Guptill went back into his crease and slugged it with a flat bat hard over the bowler
bowled into the blockhole, Guptill has to defend this time
Williamson you beauty! He moves outside leg stump so smoothly and plays the lofted drive inside out over extra cover, so balanced while playing that shot
short of a length outside off, steered to short third man, Guptill rushes through for the single
nearly in the blockhole around off, Guptill had cleared his front foot but then had to push the ball into the covers
a full toss, clears his front foot and swings it to deep midwicket, not timed all that well

he's timed this all right, 50 off 19 balls, gets there by clearly his front foot and smashing the ball far over long on, it was too full and Guptill got under it, that's the fastest T20 fifty for NZ too!
the slower ball bowled full outside off, Guptill winds up and swings powerfully but does not connect
worked off the pads behind square for two more
moves outside leg but the bowler follows him and cramps him for room, Williamson adjusts and dabs the ball towards third man
the slower short ball, Guptill tries to upper cut it but is beaten
driven hard to long on for a single
good length on off and middle, Williamson stays in his crease and whips the ball through square leg
short ball, Guptill backs away towards leg, winds up and pulverizes the ball flat over the square leg boundary, pulled with tremendous power
played from the crease towards midwicket
stays back and pulls the short of a length ball through midwicket
the slower ball but Guptill can see everything now, he gets on the front foot and heaves across the line, bashing the ball into the stands beyond deep midwicket

caught behind this time, the Guptil show is over and Eden Park rises to applaud him. Guptill chased after a wide ball on a blockhole length and edged it to the keeper. He goes after scoring the fastest T20 fifty for NZ
gets on the front foot and swings across the line, makes no contact and is hit on the pad
that's a huge hit second ball! Steps out of his crease to a full ball and carts it over long on with a full swing of the bat
flicked off the front foot towards square leg
bowled flat and shorter, Munro goes back and pulls the ball from outside off towards cow corner
New Zealand blaze past 100, Munro takes them there by clearing his front foot and slogging the ball with the turn high and far over deep midwicket
beaten outside the off stump this time
goes over long off this time, stepping out to a full ball and driving it hard and flat over the boundary
poor Vandersay, he disappears again, Munro getting under a full ball and mowing it over deep square leg with a slog sweep
short and wide outside off, angling across the right-hander, Williamson stands in his crease and cuts over point
a length ball with lots of width outside off, Wiliamson reaches for it and hits the ball through cover
the slower ball, Munro is beaten by the change of pace and the ball bounces over his stumps
Munro charges again, and dispatches the slower ball from wide outside the off stump over the cow corner boundary, incredible hitting
tries to hit on the leg side but gets an inside edge on the pad towards the off side
short of a length ball, pulled through square leg
fuller ball on the pads, played through square leg for a single, Williamson slipped as he turned for the second so they did not run it
sprayed wide outside the off stump from over the wicket ...
catch it in the stands beyond long off! Munro gets under a full ball and slams it high and far, and it has been caught in the crowd
a full ball outside off stump, chopped into the ground and towards the keeper
full toss, Williamson drives past the bowler for a single
a full toss outside off stump, Munro hits it flat over the infield at cover for a four

and he's done it! That is amazing from Munro, he's hit seven sixes in 14 balls. Guptill's 19-ball record for fastest NZ fifty has lasted all of 20 minutes. Munro ends the game by mowing the ball off the front foot over deep square. The slaughter of Sri Lanka is over. Munro's 14-ball fifty is the second fastest 50 in T20 internationals, behind Yuvraj Singh's 12-ball innings
